official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery for study for potential addition to the national trails system.
short_title: Selma to Montgomery National Trail Study Act of 1989

summary.text: Selma to Montgomery National Trail Study Act of 1989 - Amends the National Trails System Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery, Alabama (traveled by the march dramatizing the need for voting rights legislation), for study for potential addition to the national trails system.

titles.title: Selma to Montgomery National Trail Study Act of 1989
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to designate the route from Selma to Montgomery for study for potential addition to the national trails system.
